metadata.title: CVE-2022-22746 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
A race condition could have allowed bypassing the fullscreen notificationwhich could have lead to a fullscreen window spoof beingunnoticed.
*This bug only affects Firefox for Windows. Other operatingsystems are unaffected.*. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 91.5,Firefox < 96, and Thunderbird < 91.5.

criterions.comment: mozjs78 package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
